label: Ensure the application accessing the Azure container instances is running on a platform that supports TLS 1.2 or above
description: Containers itself does not support TLS 1.2. In order to enable application to communicate with the container group with in organizational VNet using TL 1.2, The static private IP address exposed through application gateway and enabling TLS 1.2 on application gateway.
link: link to terrform line/comment where requirement is implemented
